In this workshop, Nick will demonstrate how the R package **shiny** can be used to create interactive websites. Note that this is the first session of a two-sesssion workshop. The second session is on Thursday March 31.

> **Nick van Doormaal** is a former PhD candidate at the NSCR and is currently a tactical analysist at the Gelderse Omgevingsdiensten.
